description:
Course Description

Learn how to build beautiful mobile friendly landing pages using WordPress, add opt-in forms to get leads on your landing page, embed your videos from Youtube, Vimeo and DailyMotion.

Installing WordPress is easy, but installing WordPress securely is something you need to learn so you can make your website hack proof and prevent any malware injections.

Overview

This course is suitable for beginner students who want to set up landing pages for any business purpose or personal needs.

We start with registering a domain name, and mastering secure WordPress installation with Wordfence configuration to hack proof your website.

Create beautiful landing pages, integrate forms and embed videos from the top popular video platforms online.

Students who complete this course will be able to create landing pages on a WordPress website and customize them on the fly with integration of customized opt-in forms and videos.

What youâ€™ll learn

  • Learn to customize the design of the landing pages
  • Play with colorful headings, fonts and Rich text editing
  • Embed videos from Youtube, Vimeo and DailyMotion
  • Install secured WordPress on your hosting site
  • Registering a domain name
title: Create beautiful landing pages with WordPress
